markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Wheelchair Upgrades](/Rules.aspx?ID=1672)</title>

**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 71

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
A wheelchair can have upgrades added to its frame to improves its capabilities. The cost includes the installation of the upgrade.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Wheelchair Upgrades
